titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should reimburse the Federal Government for the estimated $4,400,000 in costs incurred by the Office of Independent Counsel in investigating his relationship with Ms. Monica Lewinsky.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/18/1998--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President should reimburse the Government for the estimated $4.4 million in costs incurred by the Office of Independent Counsel in investigating his relationship with Monica Lewinsky.
